content: Park located in Yishun, Singapore **Yishun Neighbourhood Park** is a park located in [Yishun](/wiki/Yishun), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). The 7.7 hectares park was developed on an old rubber estate and features a hill with an open lawn, ideal for picnics. Facilities include children's playground and fitness equipment. - [List of parks in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_parks_in_Singapore) This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Yishun Neighbourhood Park
